value.title: Manatee County Schools expand meal distribution during coronavirus closure
value.excerpt: MANATEE COUNTY, Fla. — Amid the coronavirus pandemic, all Florida schools are closed until at least April 15. Manatee County Schools on Friday announced an expansion of meal distribution for students during that time. The district says school-aged children will continue to get meals from meal sites and bus routes starting March 30.

value.title: Some US schools close for school year as COVID-19 crisis worsens
value.excerpt: Schools could be closed for several more weeks or months and in the state of Virginia, classes have been cancelled for the rest of the school year. Schools across the United States have been closed, most with little notice. And many state and local officials are unsure when classes will resume. Some could be closed for several more weeks or months.
